member.name: T:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions
member.summary: Represents a series of Model loading settings, like Unity Model Importer settings.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UseFileScale
member.summary: Turn on this flag to use the file's original scale.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ScaleFactor
member.summary: Model scale multiplier.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.SortHierarchyByName
member.summary: Turn on this field to sort the Model hierarchy by name.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportVisibility
member.summary: Turn on this field to apply the visibility property to Mesh Renderers/Skinned Mesh Renderers.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.Static
member.summary: Turn on this field to import the Model as a static Game Object.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.AddAssetUnloader
member.summary: Turn on this field to add the Asset Unloader Component to the loaded Game Object, which deallocates resources automatically.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportMeshes
member.summary: Turn on this field to import Model Meshes.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.LimitBoneWeights
member.summary: Turn on this field to limit bone weights to 4 per bone.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ReadEnabled
member.summary: Turn on this field to leave imported Meshes readable.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MarkMeshesAsDynamic
member.summary: Turn on this field to mark created meshes as dynamic.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.OptimizeMeshes
member.summary: Turn on this field to optimize imported Meshes for GPU access.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.GenerateColliders
member.summary: Turn on this field to generate Colliders for imported Meshes.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ConvexColliders
member.summary: Turn on this field to generate convex Colliders when the GenerateColliders field is enabled.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportBlendShapes
member.summary: Turn on this field to import Mesh Blend Shapes.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportColors
member.summary: Turn on this field to import Mesh colors.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.IndexFormat
member.summary: Mesh index format (16 or 32 bits).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.LODScreenRelativeTransitionHeightBase
member.summary: Defines the initial screen relative transition height when creating LOD Groups.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.KeepQuads
member.summary: Turn on this field to maintain Mesh quads. (Useful for DX11 tessellation)

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportNormals
member.summary: Turn on this field to import Mesh normals. If disabled, normals will be calculated instead.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.GenerateNormals
member.summary: Turn off this field to disable Mesh normals generation.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.GenerateTangents
member.summary: Turn off this field to disable Mesh tangents generation.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.SmoothingAngle
member.summary: Normals calculation smoothing angle.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportBlendShapeNormals
member.summary: Turn on this field to import Mesh Blend Shape normals.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.CalculateBlendShapeNormals
member.summary: Turn on this field to calculate Mesh Blend Shape normals when none can be imported.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportTangents
member.summary: Turn on this field to import Mesh tangents. If disabled, tangents will be calculated instead.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.SwapUVs
member.summary: Turn on this field to swap Mesh UVs. (uv1 into uv2)

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportMaterials
member.summary: Turn on this field to import Materials.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MaterialMappers
member.summary: Mappers used to create suitable Unity Materials from original Materials.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportTextures
member.summary: Turn on this field to import Textures.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ScanForAlphaPixels
member.summary: Turn on this field to scan Textures for alpha-blended pixels in order to generate transparent Materials.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.AlphaMaterialMode
member.summary: Chooses the way TriLib creates alpha materials. The options are: None: Does not create any alpha material and uses opaque materials instead. Cutout: Creates cutout alpha materials where applicable. Transparent: Creates transparent (alpha) materials where applicable. Cutout + Transparent: Creates both materials and uses the second one as a copy from the semi-transparent mesh. This field is ignored when the Material Mapper uses a Shader Variant Collection.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.DoubleSidedMaterials
member.summary: Turn on this field to create double-sided Materials (TriLib does that by duplicating the original Meshes).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.TextureMappers
member.summary: Mappers used to find native Texture Streams from custom sources.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.TextureCompressionQuality
member.summary: Texture compression to apply on loaded Textures.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.GenerateMipmaps
member.summary: Turn on this field to enable Textures mip-map generation.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.FixNormalMaps
member.summary: Turn on this field to change the normal map channel order to ABBR instead of RGBA.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.AnimationType
member.summary: Model rigging type.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.SimplifyAnimations
member.summary: Turn on this field to simplify animation curves.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.PositionThreshold
member.summary: Position simplification threshold. The smaller the values, the more precision.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.RotationThreshold
member.summary: Rotation simplification threshold (in degrees). The smaller the values, the more precision.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ScaleThreshold
member.summary: Scale simplification threshold. The smaller the values, the more precision.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.AvatarDefinition
member.summary: Type of Avatar creation for the Model.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.Avatar
member.summary: Source Avatar to use when copying from another Avatar.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.HumanDescription
member.summary: Human Description used to create the humanoid Avatar, when the humanoid rigging type is selected.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.RootBoneMapper
member.summary: Mapper used to find the Model root bone.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.HumanoidAvatarMapper
member.summary: Mapper used to map the humanoid Avatar bones when the humanoid rigging type is selected.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.LipSyncMappers
member.summary: Mappers used to configure Lip-Sync Blend Shapes.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.SampleBindPose
member.summary: Turn on this field to sample the loaded Model to the bind-pose when rigging.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.EnforceTPose
member.summary: Turn on this field to enforce the loaded Model to the T-pose when rigging.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.EnforceAnimatorWithLegacyAnimations
member.summary: Turn on this field to add an Animator when the AnimationType is set to Legacy.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.AutomaticallyPlayLegacyAnimations
member.summary: Turn on this field to play Legacy Animation Clips automatically (The first available Clip will be played).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ResampleFrequency
member.summary: Defines the FBX Rotation Animation Curve resampling frequency. (1 = every frame, 2 = every 2 frames, 3 = every 3 frames, and so on)

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.AnimationWrapMode
member.summary: Default wrap-mode to apply to Animations.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.AnimationClipMappers
member.summary: Mappers used to process Animation Clips.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ExternalDataMapper
member.summary: Mapper used to find data Streams on external sources.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ShowLoadingWarnings
member.summary: Turn on this field to display Model loading warnings on the Console.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.CloseStreamAutomatically
member.summary: Turn on this field to close the Model loading Stream automatically.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Model loading timeout in seconds (0=disabled).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.DestroyOnError
member.summary: Turn on this field to destroy the loaded Game Object automatically when there is any loading error.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.EnsureQuaternionContinuity
member.summary: Turn on this field to realign quaternion keys to ensure the shortest interpolation paths.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UseMaterialKeywords
member.summary: Turn on this field to use shader keywords on generated Materials. This field is useful when using Shader Variants to get more control over generated Materials. This field is ignored when enabling the UsesShaderVariantCollection field.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MergeVertices
member.summary: Turn on this field to merge model duplicated vertices where possible.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MarkTexturesNoLongerReadable
member.summary: Turn on this field to set textures as no longer readable and release memory resources.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UseUnityNativeNormalCalculator
member.summary: Turn on this field to use the built-in Unity normal calculator. Disabling this field allows TriLib to accept more texture file formats but uses more memory to load textures.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ApplyGammaCurveToMaterialColors
member.summary: When this field is on, TriLib will also apply the gamma curve to the material colors.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.LoadTexturesAsSRGB
member.summary: Turn off this field to load textures as linear, instead of sRGB.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UserPropertiesMapper
member.summary: Mapper used to process User Properties from Models.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ApplyTexturesOffsetAndScaling
member.summary: Turn on this field to apply Textures offset and scaling.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.DiscardUnusedTextures
member.summary: Turn off this field to keep unused Textures.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.PivotPosition
member.summary: Use this field to realign the Model pivot based on the given value.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ForcePowerOfTwoTextures
member.summary: Turn on this field to enforce power-of-two resolution when loading textures (needed for texture compression and on some platforms).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MaxTexturesResolution
member.summary: Use this field to limit texture resolution. Textures with resolutions higher than this value (when the value is not zero) will not be loaded.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UseUnityNativeTextureLoader
member.summary: Turn on this field to use the Unity built-in Texture loader instead of stb_image.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportCameras
member.summary: Turn on this field to enable Cameras importing.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ImportLights
member.summary: Turn on this field to enable Lights importing.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.DisableObjectsRenaming
member.summary: Turn on this field to disable objects renaming. Remarks: this feature may break animation compatibility as they won't work with duplicate object names.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MergeSingleChild
member.summary: Turn on this field to merge single child models into a single GameObject.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.SetUnusedTexturePropertiesToNull
member.summary: Turn on this field to set the unused Material Texture Properties to null.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.LoadPointClouds
member.summary: Turn on this field to keep isolated vertices when loading the model (PLY and OBJ only).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ExtractEmbeddedData
member.summary: Turn off this field to disable embedded resource extraction. When this field is on, embedded textures and resources are extracted to disk and can work as a cache system.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.EmbeddedDataExtractionPath
member.summary: Path to extract embedded resources. Keep in mind this is an absolute path. If this value is "null", Unity will use the "Persistent Data Path" to store the embedded data.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.BufferizeFiles
member.summary: Change this field to define how TriLib will load files into memory before processing the file (When enabled, it decreases loading times but increases memory usage).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ConvertMaterialTextures
member.summary: Turn off this field to disable "Metallic/Smoothness/Specular/Roughness" automatic texture creation.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ConvertMaterialTexturesUsingHalfRes
member.summary: Turn off this field to set the "Metallic/Smoothness/Specular/Roughness" texture sizes to the full original resolution.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.DisableTesselation
member.summary: Turn on this field to disable polygon tessellation.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.SearchTexturesRecursively
member.summary: Turn off this field if you don't want TriLib to search for textures inside all folders where the model is located.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.AddAllBonesToSkinnedMeshRenderers
member.summary: Turn on this field to add all available bones to every created SkinnedMeshRenderer.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.EnforceAlphaChannelTextures
member.summary: Turn on this field to enforce an alpha channel on texture creation.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.NameMapper
member.summary: Use a custom NameMapper to define how the final GameObjects will be named based on the input model data.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.CreateMaterialsForAllModels
member.summary: Turn on this field to make TriLib create materials for every loaded model, even those without an original material.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UseCoroutines
member.summary: Turn off this field to disable TriLib coroutines. Coroutines ensure that model data loads with the fewest possible main thread stalls.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MaxCoroutineDelayInMS
member.summary: Use this field to set a maximum number of milliseconds a Coroutine can take without waiting for a main thread frame to execute.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MaxVertexDataInitialCapacity
member.summary:
Use this field to set the maximum initial capacity of mesh vertex buffers. Vertex counts higher than that will use the default .NET exponential capacity-increasing method.
Higher values can make models load faster but may require significantly more memory. It is recommended that this field be left at the default value. Leave as 0 to let TriLib use the calculated maximum vertex capacity for the loaded models.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.CollectCG
member.summary: Turn off this field to disable GC collection after model loading.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.CompactHeap
member.summary: Turn on this field to enable .NET Large Object Heap compaction (UWP only).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.LoadTexturesAtOnce
member.summary: When this field is disabled, TriLib will read the texture resolution before creating it, which could increase memory usage. The new texture loading method doesn't do that. This option is left here for compatibility reasons.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.GetCompatibleTextureFormat
member.summary: Turn on this field to ensure Unity will create textures that can be sampled on the current platform.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.LoadDisplacementTextures
member.summary: Turn on this field to load displacement textures.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ApplyAvatarHipsCompensation
member.summary: Turn off this field if your avatars seem to hover over the ground. That will disable avatar hips height compensation.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MeshWorldTransform
member.summary: Use this field to define a transformation applied in world space to all mesh vertices.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.LoadTexturesViaWebRequest
member.summary:
Turn on this field to load textures using the UnityWebRequest class (experimental). UnityWebRequest is the fastest way to load PNG/JPG textures but uses more memory than other methods and does not work with embedded textures.
This feature is experimental. Textures are always loaded in sRGB colorspace when this option is turned on, which could cause normal map issues.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.MaxObjectsToRename
member.summary: Use this field to set the maximum number of objects TriLib can rename. Renaming is an expensive process, so it's advised to keep this value low.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.ConvertTexturesAs2D
member.summary: Turn off this field to keep processed/composed textures as RenderTextures.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UseSharedMaterials
member.summary: Turn off this field to use the renderers' "materials" property instead of "sharedMaterials".

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UseSharedMeshes
member.summary: Turn on this field to use mesh filters' "mesh" property instead of "sharedMesh". It is recommended to turn on this field if you don't need to modify your meshes at runtime.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.BlendShapeMapper
member.summary: Use this field to set a BlendShapeMapper to use with the loaded model. BlendShapeMappers can replace the Unity built-in blend shape playback system.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.UpdateSkinnedMeshRendererWhenOffscreen
member.summary: Turn on this field to update SkinnedMeshRenderers when they're offscreen.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderOptions.DoPBRConversion
member.summary: Turn off this field to disable Phong to PBR conversion based on: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/remote-rendering/reference/material-mapping

member.name: T:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext
member.summary: Serves as the central context for managing a model loading operation in TriLib. This class stores references to the loaded objects (GameObjects, textures, materials), user options, callbacks, and intermediate state (e.g., asynchronous tasks, in-flight texture loads).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.Allocations
member.summary: A list of Unity objects (e.g., , , ) that have been allocated during the model loading process.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.GameObjectPaths
member.summary: A mapping between created s and their hierarchy paths within the loaded model (e.g., Root/Mesh001). This is useful for tracking or debugging the final hierarchy after import.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.GameObjects
member.summary: A mapping between TriLib model representations () and the corresponding s created for them in Unity.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.GeneratedMaterials
member.summary: A thread-safe dictionary mapping TriLib materials () to Unity objects generated on-the-fly. This can be used to look up or reuse already created materials.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.LoadedCompoundTextures
member.summary: A thread-safe dictionary storing compound textures keyed by a , which represents the texture plus its usage type (e.g., diffuse, normal, metallic). Each entry references the used to load that texture.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.LoadedExternalData
member.summary: A thread-safe dictionary that maps shortened external resource filenames to their fully resolved paths on disk or elsewhere.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.LoadedMaterials
member.summary: A thread-safe dictionary linking TriLib materials () to the generated Unity objects. This complements in storing final user-facing materials.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.LoadedTextures
member.summary: A thread-safe dictionary mapping TriLib textures () to their results, used to prevent redundant texture loading and allow reuse where possible.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.MaterialRenderers
member.summary: A thread-safe dictionary linking TriLib materials () to their objects, which contain references to the Unity renderer and geometry data needing that material.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.MaterialTextures
member.summary: A thread-safe dictionary linking a (material + texture type) to the loaded . This ensures that a texture used in multiple material slots is loaded or referenced consistently.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.Models
member.summary: A mapping between s created during loading and the corresponding TriLib representations (e.g., for referencing raw geometry data).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.TexturesWithAlphaChecked
member.summary: Tracks whether particular objects have already been checked for alpha channels, avoiding repeated checks or overhead.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.UsedTextures
member.summary: Keeps a set of textures that have been successfully applied to renderers, which helps differentiate between used and unused textures (for optional discarding of unused ones).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.AppliedDoubleSidedMaterials
member.summary: Indicates whether double-sided materials (i.e., materials requiring backside rendering) were applied to the last processed mesh. This can help track special mesh rendering states.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.Async
member.summary: If true, the model loads asynchronously whenever possible. If false, TriLib forces a synchronous approach. This affects how tasks and threads are used.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.BasePath
member.summary: The directory or base path from which the model or resources are loaded. Used for finding external textures or other data.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.CancellationToken
member.summary: A token used to manage the timeout or cancellation of the loading process. If triggered, loading tasks are halted before completion.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.CancellationTokenSource
member.summary: A source object that can be invoked to cancel model loading manually (e.g., by user input). Cancels tasks reliant on .

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.CustomData
member.summary: Arbitrary user-defined data or metadata attached to this context. This object can store additional loading parameters, usage info, or placeholders needed by custom logic.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.FileExtension
member.summary: When loading from a stream rather than a local file, this stores the file extension (e.g., "fbx", "gltf") so TriLib can determine an appropriate reader or parser.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.Filename
member.summary: When loading from the local file system, this indicates the path or filename to load. This may be combined with for resource lookups.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.HaltTasks
member.summary: If true, TriLib defers the actual start of loading tasks, letting the user or calling code chain multiple tasks or manually schedule the execution.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.HandleError
member.summary: A delegate for internal error handling, invoked before . This allows additional checks or logging prior to the user-facing error callback.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.IsZipFile
member.summary: If true, indicates that the current loading operation involves a .zip file, requiring AssetLoaderZip or related logic to decompress and parse contents.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.LoadingProgress
member.summary: Tracks the overall progress of model loading (a float between 0 and 1).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.LoadingStep
member.summary: Represents the loading step (an integer) for more granular tracking of progress (e.g., reading geometry, loading textures, building materials).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.ModificationDate
member.summary: Potentially stores a file modification date or version retrieved by format-specific data. This may be used for caching or informational displays.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.OnError
member.summary: A callback invoked on the main thread if an error occurs during loading. Often used to notify the user or perform cleanup tasks.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.OnLoad
member.summary: A callback invoked once the models core structure is loaded, but possibly before all textures and materials finish processing. This occurs on the main thread.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.OnMaterialsLoad
member.summary: A callback invoked once the model and all relevant resources (e.g., textures, materials, animations) have finished loading. Called on the main thread.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.OnPreLoad
member.summary: A callback invoked on a background thread, providing a chance to manipulate or inspect data before Unity s are instantiated (only when multi-threading is enabled).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.OnProgress
member.summary: A callback that reports loading progress changes, providing both the current and a float progress value (01).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.Options
member.summary: The governing how the model is imported (e.g., whether to generate colliders, import animations, or apply custom material mappers).

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.PreviousLoadingStep
member.summary: Tracks the previously reported loading step, aiding in detecting changes for incremental updates or logging. Defaults to -1 to indicate uninitialized.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.Reader
member.summary: References the internal thats parsing or converting the file. Specific implementations (e.g., FBXReader, GltfReader) fill in data for geometry, bones, and materials.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.RootGameObject
member.summary: The representing the top-level node of the loaded model. Contains or references all other child meshes, transforms, and data.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext.RootModel

member.name: T:TriLibCore.Utils.ColorUtils
member.summary: Provides utility methods for color calculations, including conversions from specular properties to glossiness or metallic values. These methods are useful when adapting material properties between different shading models or pipelines.

member.name: M:TriLibCore.Utils.ColorUtils.SpecularToGlossiness(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Converts a specular color and a shinniness exponent into a glossiness value.
member.param: The base specular color. Its red, green, and blue components are used to compute a weighted average for intensity.
The exponent representing the shininess of the material. Larger values indicate a sharper specular highlight.
member.returns:
A glossiness value computed using the formula:
DiffuseGlossiness = 1 - sqrt(2 / (shinninessExponent * specularIntensity + 2))
where specularIntensity is calculated as: 0.2125 * specularBase.r + 0.7154 * specularBase.g + 0.0721 * specularBase.b.

member.name: M:TriLibCore.Utils.ColorUtils.SpecularToMetallic(UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Converts a specular color and a default diffuse color into a metallic value.
member.param: The base specular color of the material, which affects how metal-like the surface appears.
The default diffuse color of the material. This color is used to calculate the diffuse brightness.
member.returns: A metallic value between 0 and 1, computed by comparing the brightness of the specular and diffuse components. The calculation involves a correction for dielectric specular reflectance (set to 0.04).

member.name: T:TriLibCore.Utils.TangentSolver
member.summary: Provides functionality to calculate tangent vectors for a set of vertices.

member.name: M:TriLibCore.Utils.TangentSolver.CalculateTangents(TriLibCore.Interfaces.IGeometryGroup,System.Collections.Generic.IList{UnityEngine.Vector3},System.Collections.Generic.IList{UnityEngine.Vector3},TriLibCore.AssetLoaderContext)
member.summary: Calculates the tangent vectors for the given geometry data. Each returned tangent corresponds to the associated vertex index from .
member.param: The containing geometry and UV data necessary for computing tangents.
A list of vertex positions used in the geometry.
A list of vertex normals used to orthonormalize the resulting tangents.
Contextual information for asset loading, including a cancellation token for cooperative cancellation.
member.returns: An array of representing the computed tangent vectors for each vertex.

remarks.para: Tangent vectors are computed using the vertices, their associated normals, and the primary UV set (geometryGroup.UVs1).
The algorithm computes S- and T-directions for each triangle (or quad) face, sums them across shared vertices, and then orthonormalizes the resulting vectors against each vertex's normal.

member.summary: The original source data, extracted from the loaded model. This object contains property values (e.g., texture references, color properties) that the can process.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.MaterialMapperContext.VirtualMaterial
member.summary: A virtual material object that stores property values (colors, textures, floats, keywords) used to build the final . This intermediate stage allows for layering or composition of multiple properties before applying them to the actual material.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.MaterialMapperContext.UnityMaterial
member.summary: The final Unity material instance after the mapper has assigned textures and property values. This is usually created by instantiating a preset (e.g., a built-in TriLib material) or a custom pipeline material, then applying properties.

member.name: P:TriLibCore.MaterialMapperContext.Context
member.summary: Gets or sets the that contains the overall data (e.g., root , import options, callbacks) for the current model loading process.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.MaterialMapperContext.AlphaMaterial
member.summary: Optional reference to an alpha material used for situations where a second pass is needed to render partially transparent geometry. For example, if is set to CutoutAndTransparent, this field might hold a secondary material for layered blending.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.MaterialMapperContext.MaterialMapper
member.summary: The instance responsible for converting the TriLib to the final Unity . This reference is useful if additional mapper-specific logic or settings are needed during or after processing.

member.name: F:TriLibCore.MaterialMapperContext.Index
member.summary: The zero-based index of this material among all parsed materials in the loaded model, which can be useful for tracking or referencing the original material order.

member.name: P:TriLibCore.MaterialMapperContext.Completed
member.summary: Indicates whether material processing is finished. This can be false if asynchronous texture loading or other operations are still ongoing, or true if is fully assigned and ready.
